product_name: Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure Chalk Loose - 300 grams
long_description: Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure chalk is specifically blended for climbing to keep your hands dry when you're working through hard moves. Magnesium carbonate dries your hands quickly to ensure you have a good grip. Package includes 300g of loose chalk.
short_description: Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure chalk is specifically blended for climbing to keep your hands dry when you're working through hard moves.
